title: Rich nations had vaccine options after AstraZeneca and J&J faced clot reports. Others may not have that luxury
content:
1. Rich nations had vaccine options after AstraZeneca and J&J faced clot reports. Others may not have that luxury  CNN
  2. Third Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine dose ‘likely’ needed within year, CEO says  Fox News
  3. Covid-19 Disease Triggers More Ultra-Rare Blood Clots Than Vaccines, Study Finds  Barron's
  4. Vaccine halt highlights pitfalls of effective public health policy | TheHill  The Hill
  5. Editorial: All drugs come with risk. The COVID vaccines are no different  Los Angeles Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アストラゼネカ社やJ&J社がクロットレポートに直面した後、豊かな国はワクチンの選択肢を持っていました。他の国ではそのような余裕はないかもしれません
在阿斯利康和J&J面临凝结报告后，富国有疫苗选择。其他国家可能没有这种奢侈
在阿斯利康和J&J面臨凝結報告後，富國有疫苗選擇。其他國家可能沒有這種奢侈
